author: Kathleen
text:
I was sent an item that was advertised as a shoe size 6.5, the actual shoe size is 8.5. I notified customer service that I was leaving for a trip & did not have time to return the item until I came home (greater than 2 weeks). I was told the policy is the item be return within 2 weeks. 
This is the first time I’ve ordered from this company. They misrepresented the item they advertised and then refused to work with me on their mistake.
No thanks.
title: Misrepresentation

text: I loved the website and ease of navigation with good product description; unfortunately my experience / purchase was not great. author: customer
text: I shop fairly regularly from the site, as I do trust the authenticity of their items. It has become my go-to shop for high quality basics, and their selection is amazing. One recurring issue I've noticed though is inconsistency with listing the condition of the item. Sometimes big stains will not be listed, and may be tough to see in the photos. Colours of garments can also be listed incorrectly, such as an 'orange' garment listed as 'red'. Other times damage will not be listed at all (such as broken buttons or burns from an iron). Most stains come out with a gentle wash and stain remover, but other damage can't be repaired. I would just advise other shoppers to have an eagle eye when looking at an item, and be prepared to invest a little time or money into it.
title: Great Selection but Inconsistent Listings

author: customer
text: Bought my bag more than 2 weeks ago, paid for expedited shipping and still haven’t received the item. I’m still not sure if I’ve been scammed or if I’ll get my item some day. On the day it was supposed to arrive I tracked my item and it said that it was being returned to the sender, as the sender had requested so. I talked to over 5 customer representatives and each said something different, no one could tell me what had happened with my package and why the sender requested that my bag was sent back. No one tried to do anything to make my experience a bit better. On top of that, had an agent who lied and said I was getting my bag until one specific day for sure just have another agent tell me that wasn’t happening one day later. So, very bad experience, no one is remotely worried about the customer experience or solving problems that come up during the order.
title: Bought my bag more than 2 weeks ago

author: customer
text: Sizes were incorrect (the shoes I purchased listed as size 11 but the label on the box itself says 10 and the shoes are too small) and the shirt I received was of dubious autheticity (low quality craftsmanship, construction, and fabric.) Additionally, it was listed as having a busy measurement several inches larger than my own but barely fits. Based on my experience, TRR’s product listings and authentication process are unreliable and incredibly disappointing. Proceed with caution, or maybe not at all.
